name: Little Space Game Demo
description:
A simple 2D space game with orbital mechanics. Randomly generates field map with stars, planets, asteroids and orbiting satellites. Independent factions control the galaxy and everything lives and interacts with or without your input. Take key satellites from them and advance your empire from system to system, friendly satellites refuel your ship. Gain income, grow your star fleet, destroy the enemy.

I've locked the game to a limited amount of solar systems as it's a demo, there may also be a few bugs!

No real goals (or music) in this early version, just fly around, shoot stuff, have fun, give me feedback!

Controls:

WASD / UP | DOWN | LEFT | RIGHT - up/down/left/right

Mouse - aim & fire

Q - Zoom /Map toggle

E - Command units toggle (click to highlight units and release)

SHIFT (hold) - Focus camera on cursor
